Basil Project API Documentation

Documentation Book

API documentation for the various modules of the Basil project.

  • basil: the main Basil package.
  • basil-antlr: ANTLR-generated components for BAP/GTIRB parsing.
  • basil-proto: Protobuffer-generated components for the Grammatech GTIRB format.
  • bnfc: BNFC-generated code for Basil IL parsing.
    • basil-il: Basil IL language specification (PDF view).
  • java-cup: Java CUP documentation (re-hosted).
